reviewText: I love both these movies. Unfortunately they're both on the same disc so I have to toggle on the menu to pick whether I want to watch Scary Movie or Don't be a Menace which is no big deal, unless you just so happen to not have a remote to your dvd player and there's no other way to change movies then it can be a bit of a inconvenience. Other than that, the DVD came brand new with no scratches on it.

Good movies to have in collection.
Disc was playable and had no noticeable scratches or defects.
